tables.table_title: Results of cross check of hyperparameters. $N_{C}$ the dimension of extracted spatial feature, $N_{\text {min }}$ : the number of neurons in BiLSTM layer, $R^{2}$ : the coefficient of determination on training set, $\operatorname{Val}_{1} R^{2}$ : the coefficient of determination on validation set. The best value is indicated in bold.

Results of cross check of hyperparameters. $N_{e}$ the dimension of extracted spatial feature, $N_{\text {total }}$ : the number of neurons in BILSTM layer, $R^{2}$ : the coefficient of determination on training set, $\operatorname{Val}_{1} R^{2}$ : the coefficient of determination on validation set. The best value is indicated in bold.
